title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 600.4 - Motions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22 ยง 600.4 - Motions

State Regulations
(a) Electronically filed motions. One hard copy of electronically filed motion papers
shall be filed with the clerk in accordance with section
1245.6
(a) of the

Electronic Filing Rules of the Appellate Division (Part 1245 of this

Title). (b) Leave to
file amicus curiae brief. A motion to serve and file an
amicus
curiae
brief shall include six copies of the proposed
brief. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 22
ยง
600.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
